name: Finn
ability: Creatures you control with Damage on them have "FLOOP">> Deal 1 Damage to target Creature

name: Jake
ability: Creatures on facedown Landscapes you control have +2 ATK.

name: Abracadaniel
ability: Pay 1 Action >>> Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Rainbow card, play it.

name: Billy
ability: If your opponent's deck runs out of cards, you win the game.

name: BMO
ability: Discard a card from your hand >>> Deal 1 Damage to target Creature.

name: Cosmic Owl
ability: Pay 1 Action >>> Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and rearrange them.

name: Huntress Wizard
ability: At the start of the game, choose a word with 3 or more letters. Whenever you play a card with that work in its name, deal 1 Damage to target Creature an opponent controls.

name: Lady Rainicorn
ability: If you return two or more Creatures to your hand from play or your discard pile during your turn, heal 2 HP.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
ability: The first time you replace a Creature on your turn, draw a card.

name: Magic Man
ability: When you play a card with cost exactly 2, deal 2 Damage to a Creature an opponent controls.

name: Princess Bubblegum
ability: Once per turn, you may deal 1 Damage to one of your Creatures. That Creature has +1 ATK this turn.

name: Prismo
ability: If you have no matching Landscapes, your Creatures have +1 DEF.

name: Ricardio
ability: Once during each of your turns, you may pay 1 HP. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. You may discard it.

name: Susan Strong
ability: Pay 1 Action & destroy a Creature you control >>> Deal Damage equal to its cost to each opposing Creature.

name: Tree Trunks
ability: Once during each of your turns, you may discard a card with "Pie" in its name to gain 1 Action.

name: Ice King
ability: The first time a Creature you control attacks down an empty Lane during each of your turns, it has +1 ATK.

name: Marceline
ability: Your Creatures with 5 or more Damage on them have +1 ATK.

name: Lemongrab
ability: At the start of your Fight Phase, if you have 1 or more empty Landscapes, gain 1 HP. (Can't go over 25.)

name: Gunter
ability: Creatures you control on Landscapes with Frozen tokens have +1 ATK.

name: Fionna
ability: While you control only one Landscape type, your Rainbow Creatures have +1 ATK.

name: Cake
ability: Each time a Building enters play under your control, heal 2 Damage from each Creature you control with a Building on its Landscape.

name: Doubles Jake
ability: Once during your turn, when a Creature you control damages an opponent, you may deal 1 Damage to target Creature in one of your Lanes.

name: Charlie
ability: Once during your turn, you may move a Creature you control to an adjacent empty Landscape.

name: Grand Prix
ability: Once during your turn, you may put a Creature you played this turn back into your hand, then play it for free and put 3 damage on it.

name: Moniker
ability: Once during your turn, you may ready a Flooped Creature
